title: Larethian's Wrath
content:
Larethian's Wrath Rare 2~11 Damage Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands 1d10 (1d8)+1 Slashing Weapon Enchantment +1 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: Deceptively light, the blade rasps through castle-forged plate as easily as Corellon Larethian's own anarchic holy sword through the hearts of evil ores.
